citation.title: Solution structure of the RNA binding domains of heterogeneous nuclear ribonucleoprotein M.

reference.scope: STRUCTURE BY NMR OF 196-296 AND 652-730

comment.text: Pre-mRNA binding protein in vivo, binds avidly to poly(G) and poly(U) RNA homopolymers in vitro. Involved in splicing. Acts as a receptor for carcinoembryonic antigen in Kupffer cells, may initiate a series of signaling events leading to tyrosine phosphorylation of proteins and induction of IL-1 alpha, IL-6, IL-10 and tumor necrosis factor alpha cytokines.
Identified in the spliceosome C complex (PubMed:11991638). Interacts with PPIA/CYPA (PubMed:25678563).
Experimental confirmation may be lacking for some isoforms.

property.value: Expressed in amniotic fluid and 242 other tissues
P:fibroblast growth factor receptor signaling pathway
P:regulation of mRNA stability involved in response to oxidative stress
